SEARCH
Package com.app.service

Interface ShopService

All Known Implementing Classes:
ShopServiceImpl
public interface ShopService
Service interface for managing shop-related operations. This interface provides methods for performing shopping actions, retrieving client and product statistics, and sorting products based on different criteria.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    List<Product>
    getAllAvailableProducts()
    Retrieves a list of all available products.
    Statistic<BigDecimal,List<Product>>
    getAllProductsStatistic()
    Retrieves statistical data for products.
    List<String>
    getCategoriesSortedByPopularity(Comparator<Integer> comparator)
    Retrieves a list of product categories sorted by their popularity.
    List<Client>
    getClientWithBiggerPayment()
    Retrieves a list of clients who have made the largest payments.
    List<Client>
    getClientWithBiggestAmountOfProduct()
    Retrieves a list of clients who have the largest amount of products.
    List<Product>
    getMostOftenProduct()
    Retrieves a list of products that are most frequently purchased.
    List<Product>
    getRatherProduct()
    Retrieves a list of products that are least frequently purchased.
    Map<Product,Integer>
    groupByProductAndAmountOfClient()
    Groups products by their amount for each client.

  • Method Details

    • getClientWithBiggestAmountOfProduct

      List<Client> getClientWithBiggestAmountOfProduct()
      Retrieves a list of clients who have the largest amount of products.
      Returns:
      a list of Client objects who have the most products.

    • getClientWithBiggerPayment

      List<Client> getClientWithBiggerPayment()
      Retrieves a list of clients who have made the largest payments.
      Returns:
      a list of Client objects who have the highest payments.

    • getMostOftenProduct

      List<Product> getMostOftenProduct()
      Retrieves a list of products that are most frequently purchased.
      Returns:
      a list of Product objects that are purchased most often.

    • getRatherProduct

      List<Product> getRatherProduct()
      Retrieves a list of products that are least frequently purchased.
      Returns:
      a list of Product objects that are purchased least often.

    • groupByProductAndAmountOfClient

      Map<Product,Integer> groupByProductAndAmountOfClient()
      Groups products by their amount for each client.
      Returns:
      a map where the keys are Product objects and the values are the number of clients who have that product.

    • getCategoriesSortedByPopularity

      List<String> getCategoriesSortedByPopularity(Comparator<Integer> comparator)
      Retrieves a list of product categories sorted by their popularity.
      Parameters:
      comparator - a comparator used to sort the categories by popularity.
      Returns:
      a list of category names sorted according to the specified comparator.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if comparator is null.

    • getAllProductsStatistic

      Statistic<BigDecimal,List<Product>> getAllProductsStatistic()
      Retrieves statistical data for products.
      Returns:
      a Statistic object containing statistics related to products, with the type parameter BigDecimal for statistical measures and Product for the product itself.

    • getAllAvailableProducts

      List<Product> getAllAvailableProducts()
      Retrieves a list of all available products.
      Returns:
      a list of Product objects that are available.
